com.pump.image

Class MutableBufferedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • com.pump.image.MutableBufferedImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency

    public class MutableBufferedImage
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    This is a BufferedImage that offers a setProperty() method.
